full_threads.body:
Hello,

We have decided to postpone the launch of the Premium Range until 1st December 2025 where stock levels are much higher and we can launch with much more depth in the range.

Can you please replace the below tile across all premium parent categories to the tile attached. Before you do this, can you please confirm exactly when this will be actioned, as we need this change in the system to be simultaneously accompanied by an email we will be sending to our clients to explain the postpone of this launch. Thank you.


Thank you.

Kind Regards,

BROOKE WILKINSON
